post.body: I'm attaching my MacBook Pro to the Windows server - icon in Leopard for the Windows server is an old monitor with the blue screen of death!
Based on @reply feedback from my Twitter subs, I'll launch a forum for us on Alfred.TV to continue the conversations; late Jan 2009.
Using my MacBook Pro to VPN to my Windows server; Microsoft Remote Desktop Connection tied to office PC to install Msoft Servix Pack 3;Nice!
My Twitter subscriber @rohan4apple posted on his blog an easy way to download YouTube videos; VIEW: http://rohan4apple.wordpress.com/
Had FF-Class (http://tinyurl.com/5p8h5n) Italian dinner /w business partners & co-workers; I'm so full, I can't bend over to tie my shoes.
Twitter sub @JordanNott included me in his blog on his favorite YouTube publishers; Thank you, Jordan!; VISIT: http://tinyurl.com/4zgfnj
MacUpdate software bundle for $50 ends in 7 hours; I bought it, got most serial #'s quick this time; DEAL: http://tinyurl.com/49jbkw
Don't laugh; I just had a slab of fruitcake; I happen to like it; this is the best brand - Claxton; VISIT: http://www.claxtonfruitcake.com/
Interesting article on the worth of each of Apple's divisions; READ: http://tinyurl.com/3vk7mc
If I get one more piece of spam Email from "ShamWow", I'm going to have a shit fit.
Twitter sub @JoshMcPhee says you have a Mac, DON'T get the 9000 due to refresh rate, get QuickCam Vision Pro made for the Mac.
Logitech QuickCam Pro 9000 for $77; I have the Mac version, and it rocks! DEAL: http://tinyurl.com/4kmzp6
FYI, 3 yr. old Gabriella, my 'little vortex of Evil', asked me to wear my white contact lenses for Christmas Eve. I corrupted another one.
Cousin Rich (Maria's Wife) told me that 11yr old stepdaughter Alyssa looked at baby Isabella and said "my little angel..... OF DEATH!" LOL!
Cousin Madeline just gave birth to "Madeline Deborah"; with Maria's baby Isabella, we have two new doodee machines this Christmas! Wow!
My sub @Peter_Cronin responds "I'd be sketchy about using IE; this might have been a PR maneuver to get people using IE"; Interesting!
FYI, the security patch for the Windows Internet Explorer hack has been released; here is how to get it; READ: http://tinyurl.com/4s7wm2
I just binged on a brick of white chocolate that had smashed up candy cane integrated into the mix; VISIT: http://www.SolidNutrition.com
Stilla lot of chatter on 'the health of Steve Jobs' and its effect on AAPL stock; READ: http://tinyurl.com/6pl5hl
From TigerDirect - Tech gifts/items under $100; DEAL: http://tinyurl.com/5gcxxu
Expect a few more live & unscheduled webcasts; From Jan 1 to 4th, push my Tweets to your cell for immediate notification; Stay tuned...
A 'Thank You' to all of those who joined the WebCast to see my two green balls drop at midnight; good GOW2 gaming as well; stay tuned :)
Alfred will be doing a live WebCast on uStream; channel is active now so join the chat; ETA 15 minutes; http://www.uStream.tv/adiblasi
Hi Mazy; you sub to my Twitter account? Is it due to my UStream announcements?
And for 'right now', in the pure essence and spirit of Twitter, I am going to the beach. Stay safe & have fun; maybe see some of you later!
I'm attending two parties tonight; will try to be home b4 midnight eastern for a live webcast; Stay Tuned!; http://www.uStream.tv/adiblasi
DEAL: FarCry 2 on sale at EB Games today at $39.95 ($20 off)
If anyone wants to see me drop a ball at midnight eastern via a live WebCast on uStream, hit me up with an @reply - sounds exciting, right?
Wishing you ALL a Happy New Year; for those on the road 2-night, be careful; don't drink & drive; keep your guard up; have fun! - Alfred
TigerDirect with 48 hour sale on 1 Terabyte Hitachi drives for $79 and 1.5 Terabyte Seagate drives for $129; DEAL: http://tinyurl.com/8yg34x
Apple invests 4.8 million dollars in a mobile chip maker; READ: http://tinyurl.com/92thmh
I wanted to thank all those who participated in my early morning webcast, where we spoke of 'nothing much' while I packed; more to come!
I'm lifecasting for a bit on uStream; watch me pack; big deal; http://www.ustream.tv/adiblasi
Gave Gary a computer lesson; Karen listening to Barbara Streisand; looking for remote to hit stop button.
A 'Thank You' for those who joined the live WebCast tonight with my family members; wrapping up with the gang; more to come, stay tuned.
I am live on uStream, right now, for a 30 minute webcast to wrap up the NY visit; http://www.uStream.tv/adiblasi
Purchased new Apple earbuds; audio quality, bass and ambient sound isolation are outstanding!
Possible live webcast tonight; I will push notice here on Twitter; final NY wrap up today.
Mike dropping off wine for his boss; to those who complained about their year end bonus, be thankful you have a job
Thank you to all those who participated in tonight's WebCast; sorry that the recording failed, but we did all enjoy the moment; good night!
